base_description: Round white teapot with blue floral design.
part_description: Includes a spout, handle, lid, and round body. Blue floral pattern on side, blue accents on lid and base. Handle opposite spout, lid centered on top.
internal_interaction_description: The lid fits snugly into the top opening, preventing spills. The handle provides a secure grip for pouring. The spout is designed for smooth liquid flow, minimizing drips. The round body allows for even heat distribution of the contents.
external_interaction_description: The teapot is used to pour hot liquids, interacting with cups or mugs. It can be placed on a table or tray, often part of a tea set. The handle and spout facilitate controlled pouring, while the lid ensures contents remain hot and secure.
